text:
bOnline (http://www.bonline.com) | Cape Town, South Africa | Onsite

Junior Front-end Developer (HTML, CSS, Javascript)

We are an agile, solution-driven development team in which you will enjoy the freedom to learn, choose and implement some of the latest web technologies. You will be part of a small team producing high quality web elements that meet our customers needs.

rakehurst@bonline.com for more details
